alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yaphank, or over Middle Island, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverhead, Manorville, Wading River, Center Moriches, Westhampton, Mastic, Mastic Beach, Calverton, Brookhaven National Laboratory, Hampton Bays, East Moriches, East Quogue, Flanders, Remsenburg-Speonk and Aquebogue. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
